changelogversion.changelogtext: [b]Improvement![/b] Removed fast charging ( Actually its not working for our device o.O )
[b]Improvement![/b] Built Using Linaro- 5.2 Toolchain along with Cortex A7 compiler optimizations.
[b]Improvement![/b] Frandom driver- Fast Kernel Number Generator
[b]Improvement![/b] Faux Sound Control 2.0 - A sound hack driver by faux123 ported to sprd codecs by me.
